attributes.action: to reinstate the requirement that all notices of court actions are not deemed served unless receipt is ensured.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to reinstate the requirement that all notices of court actions are not deemed served unless delivered by recorded delivery or by hand or similar to ensure receipt. Defendants must be given the right to defend themselves. Too many legal actions are decided by default.
Establishment corporations make use of the loss of this law by rail roading injustices through courts.
